summary: Computer Software Engineering graduate student at Arizona State University with 3.5 years of professional experience. Highly motivated and passionate Software Engineer with expertise in Game Development using C++. Quick learner when it comes to exploring new tools, technologies and programming languages.

responsibilities: Engaged in the migration of backend API framework for Simulink.ConfigSet

achievements: Successfully migrated critical backend API framework
Improved test coverage for Simulink components

responsibilities: Rolled out major visualization beta features into production to improve chart loading performance

achievements: Enhanced error handling and user experience

responsibilities: Worked on High Speed CT scanning - Aviation security product, installed at 1200+ Airport security checkpoints

achievements: Deployed at 1200+ airport security checkpoints worldwide
Decreased database load by 5% through optimization
